Package dev.nhuels.volunteerservice.service

Class ShiftSecurityService

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.volunteerservice.service.ShiftSecurityService
@Service("shiftSecurity") public class ShiftSecurityService extends Object
Service class for shift security. This class provides a method for checking if a user is an organizer of a specific event. It uses the @Service annotation to indicate that it is a Spring service.

    • isEventOrganizer

      public boolean isEventOrganizer(dev.nhuels.common.userdetails.JwtAuthenticatedUser userDetails, Long eventId)
      Checks if a user is an organizer of a specific event.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the user is an organizer of the event.

    • isShiftOrganizer

      public boolean isShiftOrganizer(dev.nhuels.common.userdetails.JwtAuthenticatedUser userDetails, Long shiftId)
      Checks if a user is an organizer of the event that a specific shift belongs to.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      shiftId - The ID of the event.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the user is an organizer of the event that a specific shift belongs to.
